scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:host
scripts.build: npm run build:happ && npm run build:host
scripts.test-ui-ignore: AGENTS=1 concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm --prefix ui run dev" "npm run launch -w host"
scripts.clean:ui: npx rimraf package-lock.json node_modules && npm run clean:ui -w host && npm run clean:ui -w happ
scripts.clean:rust: npx rimraf target .cargo Cargo.lock && npm run clean:rust -w happ && npm run clean:rust -w host
